name: Flicker (itch) (seabirddigital)
description:
GAMEPAD Recommended

The evil Cubeman has taken your soul powers hostage. It is in your hands to get them back and defeat him.

2D Platformer heavily inspired by retro games played by me and my brother. I hope you fellas enjoy it, we only had 3 days to do the game but we had so much fun doing it. We still have 4 more enemies and 3 more attacks for the main boss but we did not have any more time. We will eventually update it to contain all the assets created and polish it a bit more just for fun.

Note: We are still working on fixing the breaking bugs and developing the levels.

Bugs On Queue To Resolve(Contact me you find any more):

-Knockback goes the wrong way with certain bullets

-Ladder movement has colliding issues that cause animation flipping

Controls: 

Directional Input - Move

C - Shoot

X - Dash                                                                   

Space Bar - Jump

Made by Andres Urdaneta and Juan Urdaneta
